original_text: And all the people of the land rejoiced: and the city was quiet, after that they had slain Athaliah with the sword.
korean_text: 그 땅의 모든 백성이 즐거워하고 성중이 평온하더라 아달랴를 무리가 칼로 죽였었더라

sentences.original_text: And all the people of the land rejoiced:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 땅의 모든 백성이 기뻐하였으며

sentences.original_text: after that they had slain Athaliah with the sword.
